insights.insight: Enthusiast/explorer (25-50) who values discovery over acquisition, wants aficionado status
Physical stores dying; transactions moved online. Original scanning concept doesn't match reality.
Information asymmetry: Expert knowledge (Pappy 23 $2.5k is ordinary, Weller 107 $100 is better) locked in 1-on-1 conversations.

decisions.reason: Doesn't solve right problem; physical retail dying
